Creating my own threats:

Line 5-7-8 already has O in 8; 5 or 7 → nothing won.

Line 6-7-8 already has O in 8; 6 or 7 → nothing won.

No immediate win for me yet, but with my own two X’s on the left edge (0 and 3) I could start something—yet no third spot is open on the same line.
